narrative.title: 6Th Armoured Division - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armoured exploitation and breakthrough operations in Tunisia Campaign
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Mixed: Coastal hills and valleys (northern Tunisia), some desert approaches, agricultural areas, fortified defensive positions

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined arms coordination (tanks, motorized infantry, artillery)
Experience integrating with US II Corps operations

environment.terrain_type: Mixed: Coastal hills and valleys (northern Tunisia), some desert approaches, agricultural areas, fortified defensive positions
